text: Monster House is a 2006 American 3D computer-animated family horror comedy film directed by Gil Kenan, produced by ImageMovers and Amblin Entertainment, and distributed by Columbia Pictures about a neighborhood terrorized by a demonic house. The film stars Mitchel Musso, Sam Lerner, and Spencer Locke. The characters are animated primarily utilizing performance capture. Monster House received generally positive reviews from critics and grossed over $140 million worldwide.
